text.p: BLANTYRE, Nov 29 (Reuter) These are the leading stories in the Malawi press on Friday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.

- The ruling United Democratic Front candidate on Wednesday won the by-election in Machinga, more than 100km north east of Blantyre, with a landslide after beating the opposition Malawi Congress Party candidate.
- Parliament expected to meet from December 9, will pass a bill requiring members of parliament and senior government officials to declare their assets.

- The High Court on Thursday ruled that a tobacco firm, Stancom Tobacco Company (Malawi) Limited should not pay a fine of Malawi Kwacha 2.5 million ($167,000) as additional income tax for the financial year 1987.
